values.Name: Failed Payments
values.Description: Manage emails, texts and notifications for when a membership charge is denied

values.Name: Membership Status Events
values.Description: Manage emails, texts and notifications for when a membership status has been affected
values.Trigger Events: Cancelled,Frozen,Resume Frozen Member,End of Term,Payment Notification

values.Name: New Member Events
values.Description: Manage emails, texts and notifications for when a new member is created
values.Trigger Events: Converted,Member Joined Once,Member Joined,Member Child Self Signup,Member Adult Self Signup

values.Name: Member Celebration Events
values.Description: Manage emails, texts and notifications for celebrations events

values.Name: Member Attendance
values.Description: Manage emails, texts and notifications for member attendance

values.Name: On Create
values.Description: Manage emails, texts and notifications for when a lead is created

values.Name: Intro Class Events
values.Description: Manage emails, texts and notifications for lead Intro class activity
values.Trigger Events: Intro Class Scheduled,Day of Intro,Intro Attended,Intro No Show

values.Name: Trial Booking
values.Description: Manage emails, texts and notifications for when Trial Booking events occur
values.Trigger Events: Trial Booking Adult,Trial Booking Child,Trial Class Cancelled

values.Name: Meeting Calls
values.Description: Meeting scheduled calls that are tracked to monitor progress and success or not
values.Trigger Events: Meeting Call Scheduled,Meeting Completed,Meeting No Answer
